• Include these codes as defined in http://www.ada.org/snodent
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    210963DAnterior segment of maxillaAnterior segment of maxilla
    210964DPosterior segment of maxillaPosterior segment of maxilla
    210965DAnterior part of lower alveolar ridgeAnterior part of lower alveolar ridge
    210966DPosterior part of lower alveolar ridgePosterior part of lower alveolar ridge

name: SnodentOralCavityAreaInternational
title: SnodentOralCavityAreaInternational
description:
The SNODENT identifiers for regions in the mouth utilized to calculate the Salzmann Malocclusion Severity Index.

This value set contains content from SNODENT® Copyright American Dental Association (ADA). All rights reserved. SNODENT is a registered trademark of the ADA.
